Package angryflappybird

Class AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
angryflappybird.AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer
Enclosing class:
AngryFlappyBird
class AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer extends javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
This class is used to handle the timing of game events and updates. It keeps track of the elapsed time since the start of the game and clears the current scene at each frame
Author:
Robin Tran, Jennifer Pham

    • changeBackground

      private void changeBackground()
      Changes the background image of the game based on the elapsed time and predefined background shift time. If the elapsed time exceeds the background shift time, the background image is switched between day and night
